title: Michigan Firm Expands Recall of Ground Beef Products Due to Possible E. Coli O157: NM Contamination
summary: Editor’s Note August 11, 2011: This recall release is being reissued to expand the August 9th recall to now include a total of 2,200 pounds of ground beef products. WASHINGTON, August 11, 2011 - McNees Meats and Wholesale LLC., a North Branch, Mich., establishment is...

establishment.name: McNees Meats and Wholesale LLC
establishment.address:
6267 Old State Road 
  North Branch, MI 48461

impacted_products: 1 and 10-lb. clear packages of “McNees Ground Beef Bulk.”
1 to1.5-lb., approximate weight clear plastic bags of “McNees Ground beef patties.”
1 and 2-lb packages of “McNees Ground Beef Bulk” sold in red and white plastic bags.
